document_data.name: Eirontalar
document_data.symbol: A gray dragon's claw, tail and jaws breathing red flames against a light green field
document_data.mainbody: '''Eirontalar''' was a noble house of [[Waterdeep]] with interests in hunting, tracking and guiding.
document_data.Base of Operations: [[File:Sea Ward-Assumbar-Cassalanter-Dezlentyr-Eirontalar Villa.png|thumb|right|270px|''Map showing the location of the Eirontalar Villa (labeled $33) ''circa'' 1372 DR.'']] The family owned [[Eirontalar Villa|a villa]] in the [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]], on the east side of [[Diamond Street]] between [[Vondil Street]] and [[Delzorin Street]].
document_data.Members:
* [[Chalan Eirontalar]]: A consort of the family.
* [[Marlus Eirontalar]]: A patriarch of the family.
* [[Silas Eirontalar]]: Marlus's eldest son and heir.
